description: Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) has a requirement for the Remediation of O'Connor Lake Mine located in O'Connor Lake, Northwest Territories. A bidders' conference will be held virtually on Microsoft Teams on March 21st, 2023. The conference will begin at 2:00 pm CDT. The scope of the requirement outlined in the bid solicitation will be reviewed during the conference and questions will be answered. This requirement contains an Indigenous Participation Plan.
